body:
This adds some missing pieces for the Kokkos and Kokkos Kernels 3.2 release.
The nvcc-wrapper repo has also been deprecated in favor of just maintaining it inside the Kokkos repo.
For Spack purposes, kokkos-nvcc-wrapper must still be a separate package. This adds some workarounds to get nvcc-wrapper working from within the Kokkos repo.
title: Add more updates for kokkos 3.2 release, particularly nvcc-wrapper
